body:
Consider package

A/package.py:

```
depends_on('C', type=('build','run'))
depends_on('B')
```

B/package.py:

```
depends_on('C', type='run')
```

Then it seems like package A effectively depends on C only by `type='run'` irrespective of type given in A/package.py - is that correct?
title: dependency types problem - bug?
